This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] camera is granted after getUserMedia, according to permissions.query()
  assert_equals: initial camera state is prompt expected "prompt" but got "denied"
[FAIL] microphone is granted after getUserMedia, according to permissions.query()
  assert_equals: initial microphone state is prompt expected "prompt" but got "denied"
